backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing storage, authorization mixins, user profiles, trades, mistakes, subscriptions, payments, and QR code upload/clear APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to frontend files, components, and related test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files describing structure, behavior, and styling changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting metadata, fonts, theme initialization, env loader, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/public/domain-slug.txt: Contains the deployment domain slug string.
frontend/public/env.json: Holds the backend canister ID placeholder for runtime configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell handling authentication, entitlement-based tab visibility, profile setup flow, and tab rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: A dialog for entering and validating the admin password, handling success, errors, and cancellation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDisco: Manages discount codes including creation, editing, toggling enabled state, and deletion with form controls and list display.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin dashboard providing navigation to user management, payments, discounts, payment methods, QR code management, and password rotation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Allows creating, editing, enabling/disabling, and deleting payment methods, with form handling and state management.
Handles uploading, previewing, clearing, and validating a payment QR code with progress tracking and error handling.
Displays pending user payments and supports approving, rejecting, and viewing payment proof files.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRotat: Dialog for permanent admins to set or update the admin password with validation, permission checks, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Displays detailed user info and lets admins manage subscriptions or remove the user, with confirmation dialogs for each action.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state, retries, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/journal/EditTrad: Form dialog for editing or deleting an existing trade entry, including date, session, pair, metrics, and outcome fields.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalA: Shows summary analytics such as total trades, accuracy, and total P/L with loading skeletons when data is missing.
frontend/src/components/journal/ProfitCa: Monthly calendar displaying daily net P/L and trade counts, allowing month navigation and day selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeEnt: Trade entry form that collects trade details, validates readiness, and submits data to create a new trade.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeLis: Displays a table of trades with P/L calculations, edit options, and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/ViewConta: Simple layout wrapper that applies background and text styling around child content.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/EditMis: Dialog for editing or deleting a mistake entry with confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/Mistake: Form for creating a new mistake log entry with date, category, and description submission.
Lists logged mistakes with category, date, AI suggestion, and editing support, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar rendering tabs with icons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Renders a dialog for entering full name and username to create a user profile and start a free trial.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Pa: Handles subscription payment submission including uploading PDF proof, entering transaction details, and showing confirmation.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Displays current subscription or trial status and lets users select a plan or proceed to payment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Provides actor creation with connection status, retries, timeouts, and error handling for backend initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Determines user feature access based on trial, expired, or paid subscription state and returns entitlement flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient initialization and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions such as user initialization, trades, and mistakes, including create, update, delete, and error handling. Uses actor-based calls with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and applies theme classes to the document root. Exposes theme value and setter.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables for light/dark modes, plus layout, text, dialog, and z-index utility styles. Defines the app’s primary color system and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/backendConnectionErrors: Classifies backend errors into authorization, canister-stopped, or generic categories and returns structured details for UI messaging. Includes helper detection functions.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Collects environment diagnostics such as canister ID, deployment type, and host origin, and flags possible misconfiguration. Provides formatting for diagnostic output.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports constants for the app's name, tagline, and logo path. Centralizes branding values.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Validates and generates domain slugs based on character and length rules. Includes a predefined slug for the app.
frontend/src/lib/pipValues.ts: Defines pip values for common trading pairs and provides a lookup function that handles special cases. Used for trading calculations.
frontend/src/lib/riskCalculator.ts: Implements pip value lookup and a lot-size calculator with input validation. Returns calculation results with error states.
frontend/src/lib/safeErrorMessage.ts: Normalizes backend and application errors into human‑friendly messages, covering payments, authorization, subscriptions, profiles, trades, and network issues. Provides a broad fallback for unknown errors.
frontend/src/lib/trades.ts: Contains utilities for calculating profit/loss values and formatting currency and signed P/L strings for trade entries.
frontend/src/lib/tradingPairs.ts: Exports predefined trading pair options and an extended list for calculators, mapping pair codes to display labels.
frontend/src/lib/userId.ts: Formats numeric user IDs as padded strings and parses them back to numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/tabs/AdminPanelTab.tsx: Handles admin authorization logic and displays admin panel or access dialog.
frontend/src/tabs/JournalTab.tsx: Displays trade journal with analytics, entry form, list, and calendar filter.
frontend/src/tabs/MistakesTab.tsx: Shows mistake logging UI with AI suggestions and a list of logged mistakes.
frontend/src/tabs/ProfileTab.tsx: Displays user profile and subscription info with theme controls and error states.
frontend/src/tabs/RiskCalculatorTab.tsx: Implements a risk calculator for position sizing with validation and warnings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and a list of feature requirements for enhancing a trading risk calculator across funded and personal account workflows. Includes schema versioning and existing feature entries outlining UI updates, inputs, and validation behaviors.
